# maddTools

This package contains tools for the GWU course EMSE 6035: Marketing Analytics for Design Decisions

## Installation

You can install the package from Github using the **devtools** library:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("emse-madd-gwu/maddTools")
```

Load the library with:
```{r}
library(maddTools)
```
